text:
Big B in Shoojit’s next

Megastar Amitabh Bachchan is set to begin shooting for Shoojit Sircar’s production venture, whose working title is Eve .

The 73-year-old actor, who last worked with Sircar in Piku , will commence the work from tomorrow in the capital. “So Shoojit produced film starts in Delhi by tomorrow and as is wont the anxiety has begun. Always without fail it arrives in throngs of apprehension,” Bachchan wrote in his blog.

To be directed by National Award-winner Aniruddha Roy Chowdhary, the film also stars Baby actor Taapsee Pannu.

This is Bachchan’s third outing with Shoojit after Shoebite and Piku . — PTI
title: ENT-BACHCHAN
